content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Use-case: Smelts iron ore into iron plates to support resource production for subsequent crafting.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Use-case: Smelts copper ore into copper plates, enabling production of copper cables and related components.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Misuse
  – Avoid incorrect argument passing when fetching entities. Do not include unexpected keywords (e.g., ‘radius’) or excess positional arguments in get_entities() calls.

• Lab Placement and Inventory Validation
  – Ensure that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting to place it at a target location.
  – When iterating over retrieved entities, confirm that the returned value is a proper list (or fallback to an empty list) rather than None.

• Incomplete Crafting Chain for Lab Production
  – Verify that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available or can be reliably produced.
  – Confirm that prerequisite processing steps (e.g., smelting sufficient iron or copper plates) are in place to support intermediate crafting requirements before attempting to craft a Lab.
